metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22298

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5

metadata.Description: There is a logic vulnerability in Huawei Gauss100 OLTP Product. An attacker with certain permissions could perform specific SQL statement to exploit this vulnerability. Due to insufficient security design, successful exploit can cause service abnormal. Affected product versions include: ManageOne versions 6.5.1.1.B020, 6.5.1.1.B030, 6.5.1.1.B040, 6.5.1.SPC100.B050, 6.5.1.SPC101.B010, 6.5.1.SPC101.B040, 6.5.1.SPC200, 6.5.1.SPC200.B010, 6.5.1.SPC200.B030, 6.5.1.SPC200.B040, 6.5.1.SPC200.B050, 6.5.1.SPC200.B060, 6.5.1.SPC200.B070, 6.5.1RC1.B070, 6.5.1RC1.B080, 6.5.1RC2.B040, 6.5.1RC2.B050, 6.5.1RC2.B060, 6.5.1RC2.B070, 6.5.1RC2.B080, 6.5.1RC2.B090.
